alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 7:10PM CST until February 02 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Mermentau River Near Mermentau Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING TO THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage. * WHEN...From Sunday morning to Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.5 feet, Minor flooding of Beaver Park and Vermilionville near the river will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 PM CST Saturday the stage was 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 11.0 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Vermilion River Lafayette, Surrey Street Gag 10.0 9.0 Sat 6 pm CST 11.0 10.1 10. 0 &&
